meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the second epoch of the Tertiary period, between the Miocene and Pleistocene epochs.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pliocene fossils to learn about ancient animals.
meanings.sent2: During the pliocene era, many new species of mammals emerged.
meanings.sent3: The pliocene creatures must have had quite the fashionable fur coats!
meanings.sent4: The pliocene landscape whispered tales of bygone eras.
meanings.sent5: The pliocene sky painted a picture of a world in transition.

meanings.definition: A division of the Tertiary period, characterized by the appearance of modern mammals.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a fascinating exhibit on the pliocene era.
meanings.sent2: Scientists have uncovered many secrets about the pliocene through their research.
meanings.sent3: The pliocene party at the zoo was a wild affair!
meanings.sent4: In the pliocene of history, mammals took center stage.
meanings.sent5: The pliocene was a time of great change and evolution for mammals.
